# Design tokens

Design tokens are the single source of truth to name and store a design decision, distributed so teams can use it across design tools and coding languages. The implementation of tokens is inspired by the design tokens [W3C Community Group's](https://design-tokens.github.io/community-group/format/#border) specifications.

## Install

```bash
$> npm install -D @universal-robots/designtokens
```

## Usage

### Themes
Light and dark modes are available in order to create themes and can be found in the css build folder:

```
src
│   README.md
└───lib
│   │   file011.txt
│   │   file012.txt
│   │
│   └───build
│       │
│       └───css
│           │   dark-tokens-theme.css
│           │   dark-tokens.css
│           │   light-tokens-theme.css
│           │   light-tokens.css
│           │   ...

```
#### HTML Attribute
Importing the `*-tokens-theme.css` to the main stylesheet and then activate them by adding a HTML attribute in the rootDocument.

```html
<html data-theme="dark"></html>
```
#### Inject stylesheet
Injecting with webpack or other module builder.
```js
import '@universal-robots/designtokens/lib/build/css/dark-tokens.css'
```

### Using in css
Add the designtokens path in your app or library's angular.json configuration.
```js
"options": {
    ...
    "stylePreprocessorOptions": {
        "includePaths": ["libs/designtokens/src"]
    }
}
```
Using in your stylesheet could look like this.
```css
.element {
	font: var(--font-button-primary);
	color: var(--color-button-primary);
	background-color: var(--color-background-interactive);
	border: var(--color-border);
	padding: var(--spacing-04) var(--spacing-06) ;
	box-shadow: var(--elevation-md);
}
```

### Using with Javascript

```ts
import { colorButtonPrimary } from '@universal-robots/designtokens';

document.getElementById('myElement').style.color = `${colorButtonPrimary}`;
```

## Utilities
The designtokens library have utility mixins available to help extract styling.
### Typography
The typography mixin extract font styling for a given font token.
The list of available mixin parameters can be found in `designtokens/src/lib/tokens/global/font/index.js`.

```scss
@use 'designtokens' as tokens;
.heading {
    @include tokens.typography('font-button');
}
// will render:
// .heading {
//   font-family: 'Noto Sans Display';
//   font-size: 13px;
//   line-height: 1.8;   
//   font-weight: 700;
// }

```



## Contribute
If it's need to add or modify a designtoken follow these instructions.

1. Add or modify your desired designtoken in `/src/tokens/*`
2. Run `$ nx run designtokens:build`
